title: Home for Christmas
desc: I'm sorry, my love, but the training op didn't go exactly as planned and I won't be coming home when we thought I would.
Baby, "didn't go exactly as planned" doesn't mean it ran long. I'm home early, in time for Christmas!

title: Those Damn Elves
desc: Well, this looks like the right house. Now to get down the chiiiiiii--
Wow. Betrayed by the Arctic wind.
Oh, crap! They're waking up! And I look like I broke in!

title: They've Gotta Be Here Somewhere..., Part 1
desc: Man, it's hard to believe I'm getting married tomorrow. The Big Day is finally here. And it's never seemed more daunting. I'm glad my best friend and I decided to get out of town and go camping. He's been married for a couple years and I think a heart-to-heart with him will help me feel more at ease.

title: From Me To You
desc: I'm almost done with my Christmas shopping but there are still a couple people I need to shop for. Why don't you sit here with me and we'll do this together?

title: The Wrath of Grapes
desc: Whaaaa...? Where am I? How did I get here? Whereâ€™s my other shoe?
Oh, no... I remember now... Last night I got blackout drunk and confessed my love for you.
